version_description:
If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix status formatting
● Fix crash when fetching detailed fare information
● Default schedules for first quarter 2016

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix bug where some overlapping direct trips would omit the longer trip
● Fix "more information" links in Status pane
● Fix missing platform info for West Harbour

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix platform status for stations other than Union due to GO Transit website changes

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Updated system maps
● Fix iOS 11 layout issues

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix first row of Platforms tab due to GO Transit changes

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix Status and Union tabs due to GOTransit.com website changes

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix detailed fares info due to GOTransit.com website changes
● Fix for occasionally lost stop preferences

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!
● Fix sorting of platform times when they spill over to the next day
● Update maps to include Downsview Park station

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!

● Fix bug which prevented St. Catharines and Niagara Falls stations from showing up in Platforms stop picker

If you enjoy GOToronto, please update reviews every new release to spread the word!

● Fix bug in Platforms tab where times were displayed one hour off due to daylight savings, this time hopefully for good!
